  (function () {
  window.aax = window.aax || {}; window.aax.initTime = new Date().getTime(); window.aax.deliverExchangeDemand = function () { };
  window.aax.pubId = 'AAXDDFXYK';
  window.aax.ver = 1.2;
  window.aax.hst = window.location.hostname;
  var aaxEndpoint = '//c.aaxads.com/aax.js?pub=' + window.aax.pubId + '&hst=' + window.aax.hst + '&ver=' + window.aax.ver;
  function isSSL() {
  return ('https:' == document.location.protocol);
  }
  function getProtocol() {
  return isSSL() ? 'https:' : 'http:'
  }
  function writeSource(endpoint) {
  var source = getProtocol() + endpoint;
  document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="' + source + '"></scr' + 'ipt>');
  }
  writeSource(aaxEndpoint);
  })();
  </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var adsStart = (new Date()).getTime();
    function detectWidth() {
        return window.screen.width || window.innerWidth || window.document.documentElement.clientWidth || Math.min(window.innerWidth, window.document.documentElement.clientWidth) || window.innerWidth || window.document.documentElement.clientWidth || window.document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].clientWidth;
    }

    var TIMEOUT = 2000;

    /* A9 Init */
    apstag.init({
        pubID: 'edf9e12e-6c41-40a2-bcc3-2f7942aec18a',
        adServer: 'googletag'
    });

    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    var pbjs = pbjs || {};
    pbjs.que = pbjs.que || [];
    var adUnits = adUnits || [];
    /* A9 Vars */
    var a9Slots = [];
    var a9BidsBack = false;

    function initAdServer() {
        if (pbjs.initAdserverSet) return;
        (function() {
            var gads = document.createElement('script');
            gads.async = true;
            gads.type = 'text/javascript';
            var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
            gads.src = (useSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') +
                '//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js';
            var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
        })();
        pbjs.initAdserverSet = true;
    };
    pbjs.timeout = setTimeout(initAdServer, TIMEOUT);
    pbjs.timeStart = adsStart;

    var dfpNetwork = '31904509';

    // START: Defining Adunits
    if(detectWidth() > 980)
    {
        // Desktop Adunits
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Desktop_Leaderboard_ATF',
                size: [[728, 90]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Desktop_Leaderboard_ATF',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Desktop_Leaderboard_BTF',
                size: [[728, 90]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Desktop_Leaderboard_BTF',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
                adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Desktop_RR_A',
                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Desktop_RR_A',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Desktop_RR_B',
                size: [[300, 250],[300, 600]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Desktop_RR_B',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Desktop_RR_C',
                size: [[300, 250],[300, 600]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Desktop_RR_C',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
        
                    console.log("NOT FRONT PAGE or no news module");
                                      adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_1',
                size: [[728, 90]],
                code: 'div-ad-Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_1',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });
                                                                          adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_2',
                size: [[728, 90]],
                code: 'div-ad-Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_2',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });
                                                                          adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_3',
                size: [[728, 90]],
                code: 'div-ad-Gamepress_Desktop_728x90_Extra_3',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });    } else {
        // Mobile Adunits
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_3',
                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_3',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_4',
                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_4',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });

                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_320x50_Top',
                size: [[320, 50]],

                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_320x50_Floating',
                size: [[320, 50]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_320x50_Floating',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });
        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,

                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_300x250_BTF_1',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
                                                                                              adUnits.push({
                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_300x250_BTF_2',
                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_300x250_BTF_2',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            });

                network: dfpNetwork,
                adunit: 'Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_1',
                size: [[300, 250]],
                code: 'div-ad-Arknights_Mobile_300x250_Extra_1',
                assignToVariableName: false // false if not in use
            }); 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    }
    // END: Defining Adunits

    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
      if(adUnits){
        var dfpSlots = [];
        for (var i = 0, len = adUnits.length; i < len; i++) {
          dfpSlots[i] = googletag.defineSlot('/'+adUnits[i].network+'/'+adUnits[i].adunit, adUnits[i].size, adUnits[i].code).addService(googletag.pubads());
          if(adUnits[i].assignToVariableName && (adUnits[i].assignToVariableName !== null)) window[adUnits[i].assignToVariableName] = dfpSlots[i];
        }
      }
    });

    /* A9 Slots */
    if(adUnits){
        if(apstag){
          for (var i = 0, len = adUnits.length; i < len; i++) {
                  a9Slots.push({slotID: adUnits[i].code,slotName: adUnits[i].network+'/'+adUnits[i].adunit,sizes: adUnits[i].size});
              }
        }
    }
    /* A9 Request Bids */
    apstag.fetchBids({
                        slots: a9Slots,
                        timeout: TIMEOUT
                    },
                    function(bids) {
                        console.log('BDS back',(new Date()).getTime()-adsStart,bids);
                        a9BidsBack = true;
                    });

    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        /* A9 Set Bids */
        if(a9BidsBack) apstag.setDisplayBids();
        // Header Bidding Targeting
        pbjs.que.push(function() {pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();});

        if(detectWidth() >= 2200) { googletag.defineSlot('/31904509/Gamepress_Desktop_Skin_1x1', [1, 1], 'div-ad-Gamepress_Desktop_Skin_1x1').addService(googletag.pubads()); }

        // Init DFP
        googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
        googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();
        googletag.enableServices();
    });
</script>

<script>
  var baseURL = "https://gamepress.gg";

  function enableDM() {
    var newNode = {
      _links: {
          type: {
              href: baseURL + '/user/{user}'
          }
      },
      field_dark_mode: {
          value: 1
      }
    };
    getCsrfToken(function(csrfToken) {
        postNode(csrfToken, newNode);
    });
  }

  function getCsrfToken(callback) {
    jQuery
      .get(Drupal.url('session/token'))
      .done(function (data) {
        var csrfToken = data;
        callback(csrfToken);
      });
  }

  function patchNode(csrfToken, node) {
  var urlJSON = baseURL + '/user/' + userID2 + '?_format=hal_json'
  jQuery.ajax({
    url: urlJSON,
    method: 'PATCH',
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/hal+json',
      'X-CSRF-Token': csrfToken
    },
    data: JSON.stringify(node),
    success: function (node) {
      window.location.href = baseURL;
    }
  });
}


</script> </div>

<script>

function decodeHtml(html) {
    var txt = document.createElement("textarea");
    txt.innerHTML = html;
    return txt.value;
}

function getPathByValue(value){
    for(var i = 0; i < list.length; i++){
        if(list[i].toLowerCase() == value.toLowerCase()){
            return paths[i];
        }
    }
}
/* Set the width of the side navigation to 250px */

function openNav() {
  var $slider = document.getElementById('sidenav');
  $slider.setAttribute("class", "slide-in");
  document.getElementById("overlay").style.display = "block";
  document.getElementById("menu-close").style.display = "block";
  document.getElementById("bottom-sticky-ad").style.display = "none";
  document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
}

function closeNav() {
  var $slider = document.getElementById('sidenav');
  $slider.setAttribute("class", "slide-out");
  document.getElementById("overlay").style.display = "none";
  document.getElementById("menu-close").style.display = "none";
  document.getElementById("bottom-sticky-ad").style.display = "block";
  document.body.style.overflow = "auto";
}

</script>

<div id="page-title">
<h1>Interactive Operator List</h1>
<div class="title-sub">
<div class="last-updated-date">
<time datetime="2022-07-05">Last Updated: July 5, 2022 | </time>
</div>
<a target="_blank" href="https://gamepress.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals">Submit Feedback or Error</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="">
<div data-drupal-messages-fallback class="hidden"></div>
<div id="block-gamepressbase-content" class="block block-system block-system-main-block">
<article id="node-1381" class="" data-history-node-id="1381" role="article" about="/arknights/tools/interactive-operator-list" typeof="schema:WebPage">
<div class="page-top-content">
<div class="og-image">
 <img src="/arknights/sites/arknights/files/styles/banner_image/public/2020-03/Feature%20Image%20Operator%20List.jpg?h=457da100&amp;itok=AiuYw7pJ" width="1200" height="630" alt="" typeof="foaf:Image" class="image-style-banner-image" />
</div>

<div class="field__item"><span id="topic-2061">
<div id="intro"></div><div class="topic-text"> <div class="paragraph paragraph--type--text paragraph--view-mode--default">
<div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-text field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><h2>RECENT UPDATES</h2>
<p>8/31 - Added Advanced Filter Options, which allows filtering on Special abilities like Silence, Operator buffs, enemy debuffs, etc.</p>
<h2>Interactive Operator List</h2>
<p>Below is thelist of Operatorsfound in Arknights. This list allows a player to Filter,Sort, and Viewmany different options in order to easily view and compare different aspects ofOperators in the game.</p>
<h3><strong>Filtering Options</strong></h3>
<ul><li><strong>Rarity</strong>- Includes Operatorsof selected rarities. Includes all rarities if none are selected.</li>
<li><strong>Class/Archetype</strong>- Includes Operators of selected Classes and/or Archetypes.Includes all Classes and Archetypes if none are selected.</li>
</ul></div>
</div>
<div class="paragraph paragraph--type--featured-content-list paragraph--view-mode--default">
<div class="field field--name-field-featured-content-list">
<a href="https://gamepress.gg/arknights//core-gameplay/arknights-class-and-archetype-guide"><div class="field__item "><div class="featured-content-list-main ">
<div class="featured-list-image">
<div class="field field--name-field-og-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item"> <img src="/arknights/sites/arknights/files/styles/featured_content_list/public/2020-07/ClassAndArchetypesFeature.jpg?itok=nIUSQRIr" width="100" height="53" alt="" typeof="foaf:Image" class="image-style-featured-content-list" />
</div>
</div>
<div class="featured-list-link">Arknights: Class And Archetype Guide</div>
</div>
</div></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="paragraph paragraph--type--text paragraph--view-mode--default">
<div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-text field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><ul><li><strong>Release Status</strong>- Includes Operators that are available on the selected Servers. All Operators are listed if none are selected. (Default is Global only)</li>
</ul><h4>Advanced Filters</h4>
<ul><li><strong>Status, Buff, Debuff, and Function</strong>- Will display Operators that have the specified ability when the filter is selected. (multiple can be selected, results will be inclusive)</li>
<li><strong>Target</strong>- Includes Operators that have the selected number of targets.</li>
<li><strong>Damage Type</strong>- Includes Operators that have the selected Damage Types.</li>
<li><strong>Position</strong>- includes Operators that have the selected Position.</li>
</ul></div>
</div>
<div class="paragraph paragraph--type--text paragraph--view-mode--default">
<div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-text field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><h3><strong>Show (View) Options</strong></h3>
<ul><li><strong>Stats</strong>- ShowsOperator stats, targets, and damage type.</li>
<li><strong>Traits</strong>- Shows Operator Traits (highest level of Trait is shown)</li>
<li><strong>Skills</strong>- Shows Operator Skill details (highest level of each skill is shown)</li>
<li><strong>Talents</strong>- Shows Operator Talents.</li>
<li><strong>Evaluation</strong>- A summary of pros and cons of the Operator from Botzu.</li>
<li><strong>Ability Tags</strong>- the list of special abilities of that Operator (that can be filtered on in the Advanced Filter section)</li>
</ul><h3><strong>Sort Options</strong></h3>
<p>Stats shown are at highest promotion and level possible. Maximum Trust and Potential stats can be add/removed with their respective check-boxes.</p>
<ul><li><strong>Newest</strong>- Sorts by CN Release Date</li>
<li><strong>Operator</strong>- Sorts alphabetically by Operator Name</li>
<li><strong>Rarity</strong>- Sorts by Operator rarity</li>
<li><strong>HP</strong>- Sorts by Operator HP</li>
<li><strong>ATK</strong>- Sorts by Operator ATK</li>
<li><strong>DEF</strong>- Sorts by Operator DEF</li>
<li><strong>DP Cost</strong>- Sorts by the Operator Deployment Cost</li>
<li><strong>RES</strong>- Sorts by innate Arts Resistance</li>
<li><strong>Block</strong>- Sorts by Block count</li>
<li><strong>Redeploy</strong>- Sorts by Redeploy time</li>
<li><strong>ATK Interval</strong>- Sorts by the Operator AttackInterval</li>
</ul><p>For a list of <strong>Release Dates</strong> and <strong>how to obtain each Operator</strong> and more, check out the links below!</p></div>
</div>
<div class="paragraph paragraph--type--featured-content-list paragraph--view-mode--default">
<div class="field field--name-field-featured-content-list">
<a href="https://gamepress.gg/arknights//database/operator-release-dates-and-how-obtain"><div class="field__item "><div class="featured-content-list-main ">
<div class="featured-list-image">
<div class="field field--name-field-og-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item"> <img src="/arknights/sites/arknights/files/styles/featured_content_list/public/2020-01/OperatorReleaseDates.png?itok=89GQB7le" width="100" height="57" alt="" typeof="foaf:Image" class="image-style-featured-content-list" />
</div>
</div>
<div class="featured-list-link">Operator Release Dates and How to Obtain</div>
</div>
</div></a>
</div>
</div>
</div></span>
</div>
<div class="field__item">
<div class="ad-container">
<div class="desktop-ad">
<center>

<div class="field__item"><span id="topic-2071">
<div id="oplist"></div> <h2 class="main-title">Operators</h2>
<div class="topic-text">
<style>
    .skills-section, .talents-section{
      text-align:left;
    }
    .skill-title{
      font-weight:bold;
    }
    .skill-cell{
      padding:2px;
    }
    .filter-table th{
      text-align:center;
    }
  </style>
<h3 class="sub-title">Filter</h3>
<table class="tier-filter-table  filters-Rarity clearfix" style="text-align:center;" style="font-size:12px;">
<tr>
<th colspan="6" style="text-align:center; font-size:14px;">Rarity</th>
</tr>
<tr>

<img src="/arknights/sites/arknights/files/styles/thumbnail/public/2020-04/star1.png?itok=qTmcUs51" />
</td>
<td class="filter-inactive tier-filter-cell filter-data filter-rarity-2" id="filter-rarity-2" onclick='toggleFilter(this, "cat-1", parseInt("371"))' data-url-id="2">

</td>

</td>

</td>

<table class="tier-filter-table  filters-Gender clearfix" style="text-align:center;" style="font-size:12px;">
<tr>

</tr>
<tr>
<td class="filter-inactive tier-filter-cell filter-data filter-gender-conviction" id="filter-gender-conviction" onclick='toggleFilter(this, "cat-2", parseInt("6841"))' data-url-id="conviction">
<div class="filter-name">Conviction</div>
</td>
<td class="filter-inactive tier-filter-cell filter-data filter-gender-female" id="filter-gender-female" onclick='toggleFilter(this, "cat-2", parseInt("601"))' data-url-id="female">
<div class="filter-name">Female</div>
</td>
<td class="filter-inactive tier-filter-cell filter-data filter-gender-male" id="filter-gender-male" onclick='toggleFilter(this, "cat-2", parseInt("596"))' data-url-id="male">
<div class="filter-name">Male</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<script>
var filters = {};
var actualFilterFunction = null;
let afterCallbackFunctions = {};
var url_hash = "true"
          filters["cat-1"] = [];
          filters["cat-2"] = [];
        //should be set in the list template (if needed)
    //for if the VALUE includes the FILTER (might need the opposite case at some point)
    var includeFilters = [];
    var matchAllFilters = [];
    //for when they set it to OR - these filters won't be in the OR clause and will instead be AND'd with the result of the OR clause (every other filter will be OR'd)
    var and_filters = [];
    var filter_condition = "";

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(){
    var hash = window.location.hash;
    if(hash) {
        var hash_tags = hash.substring(6).split("##")
        for (var tag = 0; tag < hash_tags.length; tag++) {
            hash_tags[tag] = decodeURIComponent(hash_tags[tag]).replace(/ /g, "-");
            $('td[data-url-id="' + hash_tags[tag] + '"]').click();
            $('img[data-url-id="' + hash_tags[tag] + '"]').click();
            $('div[data-url-id="' + hash_tags[tag] + '"]').click();
        }
    }
});

  function toggleFilter(element, type, filter){
        var currFilters = filters[type];
        var idx = currFilters.indexOf(filter);
        if(idx == -1){
            filters[type].push(filter);
            $(element).removeClass("filter-inactive");
            $(element).addClass("active-filter");
        }
        else{
            filters[type].splice(idx, 1);
            $(element).removeClass("active-filter");
            $(element).addClass("filter-inactive");
        }
        actualFilterFunction ? actualFilterFunction() : applyFilters();
        if (url_hash) {
            var hashString = "";
            var urlId = document.getElementsByClassName('active-filter');
            for(var i = 0; i < urlId.length; i++) {
                hashString += urlId[i].getAttribute('data-url-id');
                if(i < urlId.length - 1) {
                    hashString += "##"
                }
            }
            window.location.hash = "#tags=" + hashString;
        }
        applyAfterCallbackFunctions(element, type, filter);
        
    }

    function applyAfterCallbackFunctions(element, type, filter){
        for(let key in afterCallbackFunctions){
            if(key === "##all##" || key == filter){
                afterCallbackFunctions[key](element, type, filter);
            }
        }
    }

    function toggleUniqueFilter(element, type, filter){
        var currFilters = filters[type];
        var idx = currFilters.indexOf(filter);
        if(idx == -1){
            filters[type] = [filter];
            $(element).parent().find(".active-filter").removeClass("active-filter").addClass("filter-inactive");
            $(element).removeClass("filter-inactive");
            $(element).addClass("active-filter");
        }
        else{
            filters[type] = []
            $(element).removeClass("active-filter");
            $(element).addClass("filter-inactive");
        }
        applyFilters();
        applyAfterCallbackFunctions(element, type, filter);
    }

    function toggleSections(element, section){
    $(".section-table .active-filter").removeClass("active-filter");
    if(!($(element).hasClass("active-filter"))){
      $(element).addClass("active-filter");
    }
    $(".tab-section").hide();
    $("." + section).show();
    if (url_hash) {
            var hashString = "";
            var urlId = document.getElementsByClassName('active-filter');
            for(var i = 0; i < urlId.length; i++) {
                hashString += urlId[i].getAttribute('data-url-id');
                if(i < urlId.length - 1) {
                    hashString += "##"
                }
            }
            window.location.hash = "#tags=" + hashString;
        }
  }

    function toggleFilterSelect(element, type){
        var currFilters = filters[type];
        var filter = element.options[element.selectedIndex].value;
        filters[type] = [];
        if(filter){
            filters[type] = [filter];
        }
        applyFilters();
    }

    function applyFilters(){
      $(".operators-row").each(function(){
        var toHide = false;
        if(filter_condition == "OR"){
            var toHide = true;
            var filtersEmpty = true;
            for(key in filters){
                if(and_filters.includes(key)){
                    continue;
                }
                var currVal = "" + $(this).data(key);
                //means it's a multi-value field
                if(filters[key].length == 0){
                    continue;
                }
                filtersEmpty = false;
                if(currVal.includes(", ")){
                    var valsSplit = currVal.toLowerCase().split(", ");
                    //check if anything in valsSplit matches anything in filters[key]
                    var foundFilter = false;
                    for(var i = 0; i < filters[key].length; i++){
                        if(valsSplit.includes("" + filters[key][i].toLowerCase())){
                            foundFilter = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if(foundFilter){
                        toHide = false;
                    }
                }
                else if( filters[key].includes(parseInt(currVal)) || (filters[key].includes(currVal)) ){
                    toHide = false;
                }
            }
            if(filtersEmpty){
                toHide = false;
            }

            var toHideAnd = false;
            for(var i = 0; i < and_filters.length; i++){
                var key = and_filters[i];
                if(filters[key].length == 0){
                    continue;
                }
                if(currVal.includes(", ")){
                    var valsSplit = currVal.toLowerCase().split(", ");
                    //check if anything in valsSplit matches anything in filters[key]
                    var foundFilter = false;
                    for(var i = 0; i < filters[key].length; i++){
                        if(valsSplit.includes("" + filters[key][i].toLowerCase())){
                            foundFilter = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if(!foundFilter){
                        toHideAnd = true;
                    }
                }
                else if(!(filters[key].includes(parseInt(currVal))) && !(filters[key].includes(currVal) && filters[key].length > 0 && filters[key][0].length > 0) ){
                    toHideAnd = true;
                }
            }

            toHide = toHide && toHideAnd;
            
        }
        else{
            for(key in filters){
                var currVal = "" + $(this).data(key);
                if(includeFilters.includes(key) && filters[key].length > 0){
                    //include partial matches for if the VALUE includes the FILTER
                    var foundFilter = false;
                    for(var i = 0; i < filters[key].length; i++){
                        if(currVal.includes(filters[key][i])){
                            foundFilter = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if(!foundFilter){
                        toHide = true;
                    }
                }
                else if(matchAllFilters.includes(key) && filters[key].length > 0){
                    //needs to match all filters
                    var matchedAll = true;
                    for(var i = 0; i < filters[key].length; i++){
                        //assumes that currVal is some kind of list that has all filters as substrings
                        if(!(currVal.includes(filters[key][i]))){
                            matchedAll = false;
                        }
                    }
                    if(!matchedAll){
                        toHide = true;
                    }
                }
                else{ //only count exact matches (ignore case though?)
                    //means it's a multi-value field
                    if(filters[key].length == 0){
                        continue;
                    }
                    if(currVal.includes(", ")){
                        var valsSplit = currVal.toLowerCase().split(", ");
                        //check if anything in valsSplit matches anything in filters[key]
                        var foundFilter = false;
                        for(var i = 0; i < filters[key].length; i++){
                            if(valsSplit.includes(("" + filters[key][i]).toLowerCase())){
                                foundFilter = true;
                            }
                        }
                        if(!foundFilter){
                            toHide = true;
                        }
                    }
                    else if(!(filters[key].includes(parseInt(currVal))) && !(filters[key].includes(currVal) && filters[key].length > 0 && filters[key][0].length > 0) ){
                        toHide = true;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        
        if(toHide){
          $(this).hide();
        }
        else{
          $(this).show();
        }
      });
    }

    var sortCriteria = "";
    var upDown = false;
    var currElement = "";

    function sort2(element, criteria, sortFunction) {
        currElement.className = "header";
        currElement = element;
        if (sortCriteria == criteria) {
            upDown = !upDown;
        }
        //set arrow class
        if (upDown) {
            element.className = "header headerSortDown";
        } else {
            element.className = "header headerSortUp";
        }
        sortCriteria = criteria;
        $("#operators-list tr.operators-row").sort(sortFunction ? sortFunction : sortTable).appendTo('#operators-list');
    }

    function sort2Grid(element, criteria){
        currElement.className = "header";
        currElement = element;
        if (sortCriteria == criteria) {
            upDown = !upDown;
        }
        //set arrow class
        if (upDown) {
            element.className = "header headerSortDown";
        } else {
            element.className = "header headerSortUp";
        }
        sortCriteria = criteria;
        $("#operators-list .operators-row").sort(sortTable).appendTo('#operators-list');
    }

    function sortTable(a, b) {
        if ($(b).data(sortCriteria) === "" || $(b).data(sortCriteria) == "-" || !$(b).data(sortCriteria)) {
            return -1;
        }

        if ($(a).data(sortCriteria) === "" || $(a).data(sortCriteria) == "-" || !$(a).data(sortCriteria)) {
            return 1;
        }
        var sortValueA = $(a).data(sortCriteria);
        var sortValueB = $(b).data(sortCriteria)

        if (sortCriteria == "hp" || sortCriteria == "atk" || sortCriteria == "def") {
            sortValueA = parseInt(sortValueA);
            sortValueB = parseInt(sortValueB);
        }

        // if (sortCriteria == "rating") {
        //     sortValueA = tierValues[sortValueA];
        //     sortValueB = tierValues[sortValueB];
        // }

        if (upDown) {
            return sortValueB < sortValueA ? 1 : -1;
        }
        return sortValueB > sortValueA ? 1 : -1;
    }




</script>
<script>
  filters["rarity"] = [];
  filters["target"] = [];
  filters["damagetype"] = [];
  filters["availserver"] = [];
  filters["profession-id"] = [];
  filters["profession-subclass-id"] = [];
  filters["profession-ids"] = []
  filters["ability-tags"] = [];
  filters["position"] = [];
  afterCallbackFunctions["##all##"] = updateOperatorCount;
  $(document).ready(function(){
      $("#sort-created").click();
      $("#na-operator").click();
      updateOperatorCount();
  });

  function updateOperatorCount(){
    const operatorCount = $('#operators-list > .operators-row:not([style*="display: none"])');
    $("#total-operators-shown-count").html(operatorCount.length);
  }
</script>
<script>
  function toggleStats() {
    var potentialCB = document.getElementById('potential-check');
    var trustCB = document.getElementById('trust-check');
    var baseStat = document.getElementsByClassName('baseStat');
    var potentialStat = document.getElementsByClassName('potentialStat');
    var trustStat = document.getElementsByClassName('trustStat');
    var fullStat = document.getElementsByClassName('fullStat');
    var sortHP = document.getElementById('sort-hp');
    var sortAtk = document.getElementById('sort-atk');
    var sortDef = document.getElementById('sort-def');
    if(potentialCB.checked){
      $(".base-potential-cell").hide();
      $(".max-potential-cell").show();
    }
    else{
      $(".max-potential-cell").hide();
      $(".base-potential-cell").show();
    }
    if (potentialCB.checked == true && trustCB.checked == true) {
      for (var i=0; i<baseStat.length; i+=1) {
        baseStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        potentialStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        trustStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        fullStat[i].style.display = 'table-row';
      }
      sortHP.onclick = function(){sort2(sortHP, 'hp-full');};
      sortAtk.onclick = function(){sort2(sortAtk, 'atk-full');};
      sortDef.onclick = function(){sort2(sortDef, 'def-full');};
    }
    else if (potentialCB.checked == true && trustCB.checked == false){
      for (var i=0; i<baseStat.length; i+=1) {
        baseStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        potentialStat[i].style.display = 'table-row';
        trustStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        fullStat[i].style.display = 'none';
      }
      sortHP.onclick = function(){sort2(sortHP, 'hp-potential');};
      sortAtk.onclick = function(){sort2(sortAtk, 'atk-potential');};
      sortDef.onclick = function(){sort2(sortDef, 'def-potential');};
    }
    else if (potentialCB.checked == false && trustCB.checked == true){
      for (var i=0; i<baseStat.length; i+=1) {
        baseStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        potentialStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        trustStat[i].style.display = 'table-row';
        fullStat[i].style.display = 'none';
      }
      sortHP.onclick = function(){sort2(sortHP, 'hp-trust');};
      sortAtk.onclick = function(){sort2(sortAtk, 'atk-trust');};
      sortDef.onclick = function(){sort2(sortDef, 'def-trust');};
    } else {
      for (var i=0; i<baseStat.length; i+=1) {
        baseStat[i].style.display = 'table-row';
        potentialStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        trustStat[i].style.display = 'none';
        fullStat[i].style.display = 'none';
      }
      sortHP.onclick = function(){sort2(sortHP, 'hp');};
      sortAtk.onclick = function(){sort2(sortAtk, 'atk');};
      sortDef.onclick = function(){sort2(sortDef, 'def');};
    }
  }

  function clearFilter() {
    $(".active-filter").click();
    }

  function refreshFilter(){
    if (currElement.id == "sort-hp" || currElement.id == "sort-atk" || currElement.id == "sort-def") {
      $(currElement).click();
    }
  }
</script>

<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A welfare therapist medic that provides a much needed counter to abnormal status effects.<br>
+ Talent: Grants Status Resistance on allies that he heals.<br>
+ Immediately heals allies affected by abnormal status, which can be great against status effects that deal a burst of damage.<br>
+ Powerful single target healing that is effective even in general use.<br>
+ S2: Active skill that can cleanse and heal up to 3 allies at once.<br>
+ S3: The bread and butter option for Lumen, grants up to 8 charges which can cleanse and heal allies. Maintains the attack boosts as long as you don't use up all the charges.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: Long sp charge time for a one use heal skill, requires overcharge for cleanse.<br><br>
</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Status Resistance Buff, Charged, Ammo, Event Welfare, Has Module </td>

</ul>

<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Flames of Castigation</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Physical damage has a 50% chance to ignore 50% DEF. Chance increases to 100% against aerial units.</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Sword of Cleansing</div>
<div class="skill-desc">ASPD +21<span class="ba-talpu">(+3)</span>. Effect doubles when there are [Sea Monster] enemies on the battlefield.</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Talent: Attacks can ignore up to 50% of enemy DEF, allowing her to easily burst high DEF enemies.<br>
+ Talent: Large increase to ASPD, which doubles against seaborn enemies<br>
+ Great with buffs and SP recharge skills, particularly in IS and SSS modes as she scales heavily with the provided bonuses.<br>
+ S1: Surprisingly strong, allows her to continuously launch some tougher small and medium sized enemies into the air.<br>
+ S2: An AOE stun with good damage and crowd control that lasts up to 4s with 2 charges.<br>
+ S3: Huge AOE damage that takes full advantage of her passive DEF penetration. Her shots hit aerial units so it can be effective against both ground and air enemies.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S1+S2: She doesn't attack enemies after they are launched into the air during these skills, so she can't take advantage of the crowd control on her own.<br>
- All skills require on attack recharging which can be difficult to build up on some stages<br>
</span>
</div>
</td>

Levitate, DEF Ignore, Has Module, Has Operator Record </td>

<div class="skill-title">Embraced Self</div>
<div class="skill-desc">&lt;Substitute&gt; reduces Movement Speed of nearby enemies by 40%, and deals 40% ATK as Arts damage to them per second</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">gir&#039;s Depths</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When this unit is in the squad, all Abyssal Hunter Operators gain +23% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> Max HP</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ An extremely resilient Dollkeeper with skills focused on DPS and preventing death<br>
+ Provides AOE dps and crowd control when substituted<br>
+ Part of a growing list of operators that provide buffs for abyssal hunters<br>
+ S2: Great damage boosts with one of the longest undying effects in the game, long enough to handle most enemies.<br>
+ S3: Huge HP and ATK books, turns her attacks into AOE and deals a conditional bonus hit. Can be paired with Gladia to make her extremely durable.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: Requires timing, as she substitutes at the end of the skill. Poor uptime unless you use and upgrade her module that provides SP after substitute.<br>
- S3: The bonus hit condition often requires you to maintain low HP %.<br><br>
</span>
</div>
</td>

Has Alter, Limited, Slow - Move Speed, Slow, Physical Attacker With Arts Ability, Ally HP Buff, Has In-Squad Effect, Has Module, Has Operator Record </td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Military Fortress</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When this unit is on the field, Defender Operators gain +23%<span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> ATK</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Bloodbath</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Instead of retreating when defeated, recover HP to max and gain -50% Max HP, +21<span class="ba-talpu">(+3)</span> ASPD, and +21%<span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> DEF (triggers once per deployment)</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ An extremely flexible DPS unit, combining several fairly rare niches all into one.<br>
+ High hit physical splash damage, rare on a melee unit.<br>
+ Massive range, even rarer on a melee unit.<br>
+ Unusually bulky for a DPS unit that doesn't lose her blocking ability.
+ S3: One of the best DPS skills in the game for when range is needed.<br>
+ S2: Can be used as a massive instant nuke, for when you really can't wait.<br>
+ S1: High damage multiplier means it works very well with buffs (IS and SSS especially).<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S1: Despite its invisibility reveal, Horn can't target invisible units so it's only effective if there are visible units to target as well.<br>
- S3: Requires timing considerations to maximize thanks to Overdrive. If you don't time it right, the target can potentially just move out of her range.<br>
- Her talent is a large factor to her DPS, but also leaves her more fragile.<br>
- Although she remains an effective blocker, her DPS suffers unless using S2, which is usually her weakest skill.<br>
- Range can be limiting on some maps since she can't target close.<br>
- Expensive to maximize since all skills are potential Mastery targets.<br></span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Remove Stealth, Ally ATK Buff, Physical Attacker With Arts Ability, Ammo, Overdrive, Has Operator Record </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div><b>CN: </b> 2022-04-14</div>
<div><b>Global: </b> 2022-10-19</div>
</td>
<td class="modules-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
[None Available]
</td>
</tr>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Sufferer of Tribulations</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Continually loses HP over time (HP cannot drop to 0 as a result of this effect); While HP is above 50%, this unit gains <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="When HP is higher than a certain percentage, gain a certain amount of ATK (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)">Vigor</span>, increasing ATK by 25%; this effect is doubled above 80% HP.</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Herald of Revelations</div>
<div class="skill-desc">While this unit has no skill active, ASPD +30 <span class="ba-talpu">(+3)</span></div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ An Artilleryman (AoE Sniper) with a very strong damage potential, Fiammetta can provide a rare level of consistently high damage.<br>
+ Powerful pick in IS due to strong damage and relic interaction.<br>
+ S2: Low SP cost along with her talent means she can activate it frequently, and it has a more flexible (but still restrictive) range than S3.<br>
+ S3: If she can be well placed, it can dish out incredible amounts of damage with 100% uptime.<br>
+ Best buddies with Skadi the Corrupting Heart who can maintain her Vigor talent at no cost while also buffing her attack.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Counterintuitive talents make her awkward and unreliable. She will always need a support unit to be maximized, and she draws healing away from frontline units.<br>
- Heavily map dependent due to restrictive ranges on her skills.<br>
- S3: key damage spot is just barely over one tile wide and damage is subpar outside of that small area.<br>
- Sound effects on S3 can get annoying when they play all the time, non-stop, for the entire map.<br></span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Vigor, Has Module, Has Operator Record </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div><b>CN: </b> 2022-03-15</div>
<div><b>Global: </b> 2022-09-16</div>
</td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Beacon&#039;s Wrath</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 315% <span class="ba-talpu">(+15%)</span> of Goldenglow's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Precise Redirection</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Goldenglow and her Drones' attacks ignore 18 <span class="ba-talpu">(+3)</span> RES</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Drone Caster that can perform map-wide ranged attacks<br>
+ Talents: when skills are active her attacks have a chance to crit which deals large AOE damage. Her drones ignore a decent amount of enemy RES which can be a significant boost in damage against high RES enemies.<br>
+ Great with buffs. Flat ATK buffs like Skadi Alter will have a huge impact on her overall stats and benefit well from the high damage multipliers. ASPD buffs greatly aid her Trait damage increase and talent explosion damage.<br>
+ Extremely useful in modes where buffs are accessible: Integrated strategies and Stationary Security Service.<br>
+ S2: A decent afk DPS skill if you plan to leave Goldenglow on the field for a while. A good skill for annihilation mode and for taking down the more durable elite mobs. The increased range can be useful as it provides a unique attack coverage for a caster unit.<br>
+ S3: The bread and butter skill for Goldenglow, it provides map-wide crowd control and damage to shut down difficult enemies before they have a chance to get close. Since it targets enemies closest to the protection objective it can also be useful in catching enemies that make it past defenses.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: It takes quite a while to charge up, and while it has good coverage the damage can be quite mediocre if you aren't fighting tanky enemies that allow you to build up your drone damage<br>
- S3: Since it targets the closest enemies to the objective, it can easily swap targets and lose out on some of the buildup damage.<br></span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Slow </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div><b>CN: </b> 2022-02-15</div>
<div><b>Global: </b> 2022-08-18</div>
</td>
<td class="modules-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
[None Available]
</td>
</tr>

<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Kindness Begets Prosperity</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When Lee is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -15 <span class="ba-talpu">(+1)</span> and Lee has ASPD +15 <span class="ba-talpu">(+1)</span>; If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Preparedness Averts Peril</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When DP is consumed by Lee's Trait, if there is sufficient DP, consumes 5 DP instead to block the next <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move, block, attack and use skills">Stun</span>/<span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move, attack and use skills (Activated through Cold effect); When enemies are Frozen, RES -15">Frozen</span> effect inflicted on Lee and Stun the attacker for 3 seconds</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Talent: Great effects that help him in his role to duel enemies. Negating a freeze or stun to instead stun the attacker can be powerful against certain enemy types.<br>
+ Great counter to long range enemies that deal heavy damage.<br>
+ S2: Low SP charge with a lot of damage scaling potential if you have allies with multiple hits to help build up charges.<br>
+ S3: Great for crowd control as he can force enemies to approach one at a time. Attacks knock back with small force allowing him to stall well against smaller enemies. Evasion and taunt are useful against ranged enemies.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- He can quickly eat DP if enemies are continually trying to stun him.<br>
- S2: Requires a lot of set up and support to get the most out of it.<br>
- S3: Ineffective against larger enemies as they can ignore the knockback.<br></span>
</div>
</td>

Enemy ASPD Debuff, Stun, Taunt, Shift Ability But Not Pusher/Puller, Has Module </td>

If there are other summons within their Attack Range, combines with them into a <span class="skill-description-value">Higher form</span><br>Active: Ling and her summons gain <span class="skill-description-value">+100%</span> ATK and <span class="skill-description-value">+100%</span> DEF. Each summon deals <span class="skill-description-value">20%</span> of Ling's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles every <span class="skill-description-value">0.5</span> seconds<br><span class="skill-description-rem">After the skill ends, gain 1 summon</span></div>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Lantern Lit, Thy Dream Sought</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Can use up to 5 summons (max 3 deployed at once). Summons effect changes based upon Skill</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">So is Writ, an Ode to Wine</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, Ling gains 4 <span class="ba-talpu">(+1)</span> SP and ATK +3% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Talent: Ling receives some ATK buff and SP when her summons are retreated or die<br>
+ Summons can fill multiple roles as they can be placed on either range or melee tiles depending on the skill<br>
+ S2: A ranged option if you want to use her summons on ranged tiles. Great burst damage with charges and a low SP cost. Using the skill when a summon is low on HP refunds them making them easy to replace.<br>
+ S3: The primary skill for Ling, it allows you to combine her summons into giant walls of stats. The active skill boosts those stats even further and provides arts DOT around them.<br>
+ A very powerful Operator for low-op strategies.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: The summons are extremely squishy and can die very easily before you have a chance to refund.<br>
- S3: The summons can be very expensive to fully deploy.<br>
- Less impactful when trying to include in a full and strong squad. Can require a lot of micromanagement if using her to low-op difficult stages.<br></span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Has Summon, Limited, Has Module, Bind, Has Operator Record, Has Operator Record </td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Rigid Ice</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Attacks inflict <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Attack Speed -30. If Cold effect is stacked, effect changes to Frozen">Cold</span> for 1 second; Apply 27% <span class="ba-talpu">(+2%)</span> <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Increase all damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)">Fragile</span> effect to <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Attack Speed -30. If Cold effect is stacked, effect changes to Frozen">Cold</span> enemies within range. <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move, attack and use skills (Activated through Cold effect); When enemies are Frozen, RES -15">Frozen</span> enemies within range receive double the <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Increase all damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)">Fragile</span> effect</div>
</div>
 <div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Two Paths, One Goal</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Grants <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Reduce duration of abnormal effects such as Stun, Cold, Freeze by 50% (Does not stack)">Status Resistance</span> to all [Karlan Trade] Operators after Gnosis has been deployed for 10 seconds</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Hexer supporter operator that mixes damage and crowd control.<br>
+ Talent: Provides one of the strongest Fragile effects, and doesn't have HP restrictions<br>
+ Talent: Grants Status Resistance to all Karlan operators, including himself.<br>
+ A powerful source of Cold (reduces ASPD by 30) and Frozen (can't move and RES -15) debuffs. Excellent support for other Operators that interact with Cold/Frozen.<br>
+ S1: Decent single target attack with a short Freeze. Good for occasionally disrupting enemy attacks.<br>
+ S2: A moderate duration AOE Cold with a very short cooldown. Can be overcharged to AOE Freeze enemies, making it very useful for groups of weaker mobs. Benefits significantly from M3.<br>
+ S3: Deceptively high damage, especially with ATK boosts. The damage can easily take down some elite mobs on its own thanks to benefiting from its own Fragile effect. Keeps enemies Frozen for the full skill duration.<br> </span>
= relatively short "Frozen" windows lean him more toward burst damage support, and the RES reduction better supports Arts damage.<br>
<span style="color:red;">- Talent: can't achieve maximum Fragile effect if enemies are immune to Frozen<br>
- S1: Only provides one second of freeze which doesn't provide for much control.<br>
- Ineffective against enemies that are immune to Frozen.</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Cold, Frozen, Fragile, Charged, Status Resistance Buff, Enemy ASPD Debuff, Enemy RES Debuff </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div><b>CN: </b> 2021-12-21</div>
<div><b>Global: </b> 2022-06-30</div>
</td>
<td class="modules-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
[None Available]
</td>
</tr>

<div class="skill-title">Vanguard Swordsmanship</div>
<div class="skill-desc">After dodging an attack, the next attack deals two hits and attacks all blocked enemies</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Pinus Sylvestris Leader</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When deployed, all 'Kazimierz' Operators gain 25% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> Physical Dodge</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Powerful Pioneer Vanguard with a great mix of survivability and damage.<br>
+ Passive dodge chance boosts her survivability against all kinds of opponents.<br>
+ Talent: Transforms dodges into more powerful strikes.<br>
+ S2: Provides high physical dodge to all Operators within range.<br>
+ S3: One of the highest dodge rates in the game from a single Operator. Has very quick cycling and strong burst damage.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Heavy diminishing returns on stacking dodge chances.<br>
- Reliance on dodge makes her kit very RNG-centric. Gets overwhelmed really easily if she doesn't dodge.<br>
- S2: Somewhat worse DP generation than other Vanguards in her archetype.<br>
- S3: Extremely quick cycling and short duration leaves her wide open against enemies that won't die from a single usage.</span>
</div>
</td>

Ally Physical Dodge, Stun, Increase Own Block </td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Brave the Darkness</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When deploying, deals 80% ATK as True damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles and <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move, block, attack and use skills">Stun</span> them for 3 seconds. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, deals an additional hit</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Daybreak</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Attacks ignore 23% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> DEF</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Dreadnought Guard with very high damage and survivability.<br>
+ Very effective against bosses and elite threats thanks to her damage output.<br>
+ Talent: All attacks ignore some Defense so she can mow down armored enemies with ease.<br>
+ S2: Consumes no deployment slots and gives 4 Shields. Can easily handle dangerous enemies with helidrops thanks to a high Attack buff.<br>
+ S3: Extremely high burst damage with wide range and the possibility of True damage that creates a very tanky summon.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Usual archetype weaknesses: 1 Block count, not too great at holding lanes.<br>
- Generally outclassed by Surtr as a boss killer.<br>
- S2: Retreats self when the skill ends, and has increased redeployment time if the last Operator deployed wasn't Kazimierz.<br>
- S3: More limited in usage compared to Surtr. The conditional True damage cannot offset her flat Resistance ignore.</span>
</div>
</td>

Has True Damage Ability, Stun, DEF Ignore, Shield, Limited, Has Alter, Has Summon, Has Operator Record, Has Module </td>

<div class="skill-title">Concentration</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When no damage is taken within the past 10 seconds, ATK +18% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span></div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Stilled Breath</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When this unit's skill is active, becomes less likely to be targeted by enemies and attacks ignore the target's Physical Dodge</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Deadeye Sniper with huge attack and map-wide range<br>
+ Talents: Effective counter to enemies with high Dodge rates. Reduced taunt levels synergize well with her talent and provide some flexibility when placing her later.<br>
+ S2: Greatly increases ASPD with good uptime. Can attack enemies anywhere on the map as long as they are blocked.<br>
+ S3: The bread and butter skill for Fartooth. Deals huge single target damage with infinite straight line range and great uptime.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: Requires enemies to be blocked for bonus range. Lacks an ATK or DMG modifier.<br>
- S3: Requires specific map placement to take full advantage of her range. Other Operators are more flexible picks that do as well or better job when the full map range is not required.<br>
- Low DEF Enemies pathing into her normal range can cause re-targeting and interfere when trying to utilize the infinite range and bonuses.</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Has Module </td>

<div class="skill-title">Unwavering Banner</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Deploys with a banner; Within the surrounding 8 tiles of the banner, allied units have ASPD +12 <span class="ba-talpu">(+2)</span> and enemies have ASPD -12 <span class="ba-talpu">(+2)</span></div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Spiritual Influence</div>
<div class="skill-desc">After deployment, the next Operator has -2 DP Cost</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Standard Bearer Vanguard with a mix of offensive and defensive abilities<br>
+ Talent: passively buffs the ASPD of allies and debuffs the ASPD of enemies near her flag<br>
+ Talent 2: Reduces the DP Cost by 2 of the unit deployed after her<br>
+ S1: Same as Elysium: good DP recovery but no additional benefits<br>
+ S2: Like a stronger version of Myrtle's S2. It can be used with increased range, gives more DP, and provides a DEF boost on top of the healing. <br>
+ S3: The bread and butter skill for Saileach. It provides great mix of crowd control, damage and damage amplification. It has good cycle and uptime. <br></span>
= S2: The tradeoff for better buffs is slightly lower duration and a higher SP cost. Rarely a reason to use it over S3.<br>
<span style="color:red;">- Higher deployment costs without providing better DP generation than lower rarity options.<br>
- S3: low DP gain for a Standard Bearer skill.</span>
</div>
</td>

Fragile, Ally ASPD Buff, Enemy ASPD Debuff, Ally Heal Not Medic, Ally DEF Buff, Stun, Slow, Fragile </td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Traumatic Hysteria</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Attacks deal an additional 50% of ATK as Arts damage to the target with the lowest HP</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Countertransference</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When there are enemies with less than 50% HP within Attack Range, ATK +12% <span class="ba-talpu">(+2%)</span></div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Stalker specialist with mixed type AOE damage and some crowd control<br>
+ Decent damage for his Archetype<br>
+ S1: Good consistent damage and can pack quite a punch when paired with ATK buffers and SP recharge operators. Probably his best DPS skill<br>
+ S2: Good for consistently Binding up to two enemies at once. Good cycle time and great skill and Bind uptime with ok damage thrown in. Probably his best and most consistent skill. <br>
+ S3: Huge boost in range and damage and stuns up to 3 targets with each attack. This gives him a unique range among the archetype and much better active skill DPS than other current stalker specialists can provide.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- mixed damage types often suffer against enemies with both types of mitigation<br>
- S1: High SP cost per skill charge<br>
- S2: while it has good Bind consistency and uptime, it is limited to 2 targets, meaning the lower rarity Archetype members may be better for larger groups.<br>
- S3: can easily kill himself if constantly attacking only 1-2 enemies and doesn't have team support. The overall skill uptime and the Stun uptime are not great.</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Physical Attacker With Arts Ability, Bind, Stun, Has Operator Record </td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Frugality</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have 22% <span class="ba-talpu">(+2%)</span> chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have 10% chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Vestiges of Vacation</div>
<div class="skill-desc">ASPD +8, when there is water terrain on the battlefield, the effect becomes ASPD +12</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Spreadshooter Sniper that deals some of the highest physical AOE damage in the game<br>
+ Great flexibility with skill use since they use ammo instead of skill durations. This allows ALL Skill attacks to get utilized (none are wasted by lacking enemies in range) and a more controllable cycle because of manual deactivation.<br>
+ Talent 1: Great for herself, and good when paired with other Snipers that use ammo as theres a chance that the ammo doesn't get consumed on attack<br>
+ S1: A decent fast-charging consistent DPS skill<br>
+ S2: decent damage and can be activated quickly after deploy. When fully charged this skill has great uptime and lasts for a very long time. great AOE crowd control with enemy movement slowing and DEF debuffing.<br>
+ S3: Her best Skill. Pretty much does anything that S1 or S2 can do, and does it better. Provides massive AOE damage, increased range and the best version of her slowing and DEF decreasing effects. <br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Typical Archetypal drawbacks of high DP Cost and slow ASPD</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Enemy DEF Debuff, Slow - Move Speed, Limited, Has Operator Record, Has Alter, Charged, Ammo </td>

<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Birth of a Hero</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When deployed, all '<a href="https://gamepress.gg/arknights/taxonomy/term/13911">Minoan</a>' Operators gain <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="When HP is higher than a certain percentage, gain a certain amount of ATK (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)">Vigor</span> effect of +25% ATK when HP is above 80%</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Goddess&#039; Inspiration</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Every hit against an enemy restores 45 <span class="ba-talpu">(+5)</span> HP to Pallas and the allied Operator in the tile ahead</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A Support Guard with a focus on personal DPS<br>
+ Trait: longer attack range allows her to attack from behind other Operators or walls and gives her bonus ATK against enemies she isn't blocking.<br>
+ Talent 1: Gives her high passive from the ATK bonus when her HP is greater than 80%. Also pairs well with other <a href="https://gamepress.gg/arknights/taxonomy/term/13911">Minos Operators</a><br>.
+ Talent 2: Heals herself and the ally in front of her when she attacks; Decent sustain, though typically not enough healing to replace a dedicated healer.<br>
+ S1: Strong consistent DPS: with her high ATK and the low SP cost this can dish out a surprisingly large amount of damage. Arguably her best DPS skill.<br>
+ S2: great for continuously resetting the attack animation of powerful enemies like the Colossus. Its DPS is the lowest of her skills, but it comes with increased range and a quick cooldown so you will have more opportunities to use it.<br>
+ S3: Pallas' big flashy support/burst skill. A good buff to pair with operators that benefit from all the stats, but it can also work fine to buff Pallas herself.<br>
+ Module: grants a decent DPS boost<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- S2: RNG dependence means it can fail its purpose, and more reliable options are available.<br>
- S3: limited buff targets and buffs are weaker than other strong buffers. Vigor from skill doesn't stack with Vigor from Talent.<br>
- Vigor: HP limitation can be hard to maintain if the operator is blocking, especially for S3 if trying to utilize the defensive oriented buffs.<br>
- Loses a lot of her DPS if blocking (trait limitation) or if she loses HP (Talent limitation). This especially hurts her ability to function as a cornerstone.<br>
- Often overshadowed by other powerful Operators that are more specialized for their roles.<br> </span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Stun, Vigor, Ally ATK Buff, Ally DEF Buff, Increase Own Block, Has Module, Ally Heal Not Medic, Ally Block Count </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">

</td>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Meal of Life</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Restores 45% <span class="ba-talpu">(+5%)</span> Max HP when skill is activated; Effect is doubled when <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Can continue recovering SP after reaching the maximum. When SP reaches double the maximum, enter Charged state. Skills have additional effects when activated in Charged state (All SP is consumed whenever skill is activated)">Charged</span></div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Poised for Action</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Improves own SP recovery rate by +0.6/second when SP is above the limit</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ Usual archetype strengths: Has DEF +200% and RES +20 while her Skills are NOT active, putting her on par with multiple Defenders<br>
+ Attacks all enemies within her attack range while her Skills are active (true AoE)<br>
+ Talent heals her every time she uses a Skill<br>
+ S1 gives her a DEF bonus while active, and Charged S1 retains her Trait buff for the duration; Charged S1 gives her pretty phenomenal defenses (plus a huge heal from her Talent), making this a great skill to support the Archetypes role of ranged tank<br>
+ S2 inflicts Slow, and Charged S2 inflicts Bind, giving Carnelian good AoE crowd control. With ASPD buffs Charged S2 becomes unrivaled in its Bind uptime.<br>
+ S3 has expanded attack range; Charged S3 increases damage potential, great against large groups of enemies. It has a faster cycle time than most comparable skills, so it can be available more often.<br>
+ Has pretty reasonable SP costs for her Skills<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Archetype drawback: doesn't attack when skills are not active, and defenses drop when skills are active, so careful skill use planning is necessary (though charged S1 retains these defenses).<br>
- For Skills to compete against the best available, they must be Charged, meaning they must gain twice the normal amount of SP. This leads to a slower first-time Skill activation and overall Skill charge times that are longer than they might appear to be at first glance.<br>
- S3 damage ramps up over time, and the charged effect damage increase requires multiple hits per enemy to stack, making it take a relatively long time to reach its peak damage (if it ever does)<br></span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Self-Heal, Slow, Bind, Charged </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="obtain-title" style="font-weight: bold;">Headhunting</div>
<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div><b>CN: </b> 2021-06-01</div>
<div><b>Global: </b> 2021-12-09</div>
</td>
<td class="modules-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
[None Available]
</td>
</tr>

<div class="skill-title">&#039;The Tide Surges, The Tide Recedes&#039;</div>
<div class="skill-desc">This unit's Trait changes to losing <span class="skill-description-vdown">5%</span> HP every second. Deals <span class="skill-description-value">70%</span> ATK as <span class="skill-description-value">True damage</span> to all enemies within range every second (damage from this unit and the Seaborn stacks). All ally units within range gain <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Gain additional stats based on the effect (Strongest effect of each stat takes precedence)">Inspire</span> equal to <span class="skill-description-value">110%</span> of this unit's ATK</div>

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Ancient Kin</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Can use a Seaborn that lasts for 25 seconds. The Seaborn's Attack Range is regarded as an extension of this unit's Attack Range</div>
</div>
 <div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Predatory Habits</div>
<div class="skill-desc">ATK +9% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> when there is an allied unit within range of self or the Seaborn; If the allied unit is an <a href="https://gamepress.gg/arknights/taxonomy/term/161">Abyssal Hunter</a> operator, gain ATK +18% <span class="ba-talpu">(+3%)</span> instead</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ An Aura Supporter with powerful stat boosts abilities<br>
+ Talent: Can summon a seaborn on a deployable tile that effectively extends skadi's attack range<br>
+ Broad Support utility make her a great addition to almost any team<br>
+ Very cheap DP cost enables early deployment for valuable support in early stage.<br>
+ S1: Turns skadi into a tank support that will take half of the damage enemies deal within her attack range. She becomes very durable with good healing, but having a supporter tank isn't often useful.<br>
+ S2: The bread and butter skill for skadi. This gives a big chunk of stats to all nearby allies, boosts her healing and it has infinite duration. Because her deploy cost is so cheap you can easily deploy her early to activate this skill quickly.<br>
+ S3: Great attack boost if you can handle the HP penalties. The true damage is decent but this skill is used mainly for the attack boost.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- As a pure support unit, her impact on the field is heavily dependent on the rest of the team.<br>
- S3: Can be hard to use without an extra source of healing.<br>
</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
HP Regen, Has Summon, Ally ATK Buff, Ally DEF Buff, Has True Damage Ability, Has Alter, Limited </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">

<td class="talents-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Mon3tr</div>
<div class="skill-desc">Can use and heal Mon3tr, and Mon3tr has a 25 second redeployment time. Kal'tsit will prioritize healing herself and Mon3tr; If Mon3tr is not within Kal'tsit's Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0</div>
</div>
<div class="skill-cell">
<div class="skill-title">Non-Damaging Restructuring</div>
<div class="skill-desc">When Mon3tr is defeated (excluding retreat), all enemies in the surrounding 8 tiles are <span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move, block, attack and use skills">Stun</span> for 3.5 <span class="ba-talpu">(+0.5)</span> seconds and receive 1400 <span class="ba-talpu">(+200)</span> True damage</div>
</div>
</td>
<td class="evaluation-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
<div class="summary-cell">
<span style="color:green;">+ A medic with a powerful summon that can hold lanes, DPS, and deal True damage<br>
+ Longer range than other ST Medics (mostly useful for Mon3tr deployment,
+ Fast redeploy means Mon3tr can be easily repositioned or gotten back on the field quickly if he dies (along with damaging and stunning enemies). Can also satisfy some traditional fast-redeploy roles if needed.<br>
+ Skills have long durations and very low SP costs, making for good skill cycles<br>
+ S2: Use this skill when you want Mon3tr to handle waves of enemies. It charges incredibly fast and with Mon3tr's Block-3 it can function like an AoE Guard.<br>
+ S3: One of the best counters to enemies that have extremely high DEF or damage reduction. This skill makes Mon3tr one of the most powerful units due to its overwhelming stats, true damage and quick skill recharge.<br></span>
<span style="color:red;">- Poor healing output and prioritizes healing herself/ Mon3tr even over allies with much lower HP, so she doesn't function well as a general healer<br>
- Mon3tr has 0 DEF if deployed outside of her range<br>
- Tied skills do not charge if Mon3tr is not deployed and lose all SP if mon3tr leaves the field<br>
- Having Mon3tr on the field consumes 2 deployment slots</span>
</div>
</td>
<td class="ability-tags-section tab-section" style="display:none;">
Has Summon, Stun, Has True Damage Ability </td>
<td class="obtain-method-section tab-section" style="display:none;">

<div class="obtain-detail"></div>
</td>

<div class="skill-desc"><span class="tipso-top" data-tipso="Unable to move">Bind</span> a faraway target and generates a tornado centered on it, inflicting <span class="skill-description-value">-50%</span> Movement Speed to nearby enemies. Enemies caught in the tornado receive <span class="skill-description-value">130%</span> ATK as <span class="skill-description-value">Arts damage</span> and are dragged towards the center <span class="skill-description-value">significantly</span> once every <span class="skill-description-value">1.5</span> seconds. The target and nearby enemies are dragged towards this unit <span class="skill-description-value">significantly</span> after the skill duration<br>* The Force Level of the Shift is 2 (Strong)<br>* The Force Level of the Shift is 2 (Strong)</div>
